definition[0]: to try to make something more attractive by decorating it, often in a way that other people think is cheap or ugly
example[0]: We’ll need to tart the place up a bit.
definition[1]: if a woman tarts herself up or gets tarted up, she tries to make herself look attractive by putting on nice clothes, make-up etc – often used humorously
example[1]: She got all tarted up for the party.
